mapper.insert: insert into cancer_pain_treatment( person_id, unique_id, p900, patient_id, visit_id, drug_name, administration, dosage, enter_date_time, stop_order_date_time, data_version, data_db_source, data_table_source, data_field_source, created_at, creator, updated_at) values ( #{personId}, #{uniqueId}, #{p900}, #{patientId}, #{visitId}, #{drugName}, #{administration}, #{dosage}, #{enterDateTime}, #{stopOrderDateTime}, #{dataVersion}, #{dataDbSource}, #{dataTableSource}, #{dataFieldSource}, #{createdAt}, #{creator}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: update cancer_pain_treatment set person_id = #{personId}, unique_id = #{uniqueId}, p900 = #{p900}, patient_id = #{patientId}, visit_id = #{visitId}, drug_name = #{drugName}, administration = #{administration}, dosage = #{dosage}, enter_date_time = #{enterDateTime}, stop_order_date_time = #{stopOrderDateTime}, data_version = #{dataVersion}, data_db_source = #{dataDbSource}, data_table_source = #{dataTableSource}, data_field_source = #{dataFieldSource}, created_at = #{createdAt}, creator = #{creator}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} where id = #{id}
